data.name: DuplicateEmail
data.value: An account with this email address already exists.

data.value: Failed to send verification code. Please try again later.

data.value: Failed to send verification code. Please check your email address or try again later.

data.name: UserCreationFailed
data.value: User creation failed

data.value: User not found.

data.value: Email address is already confirmed.

data.value: Verification code has expired or is invalid.

data.value: Invalid verification code.

data.name: EmailVerificationFailed
data.value: Email verification failed.

data.name: VerificationError

data.name: CodeResendError
data.value: An error occurred while resending the code

data.name: InvalidCredentials
data.value: Invalid email or password

data.name: EmailNotConfirmed
data.value: Email not confirmed. Please check your email.

data.value: Account password not set. Please reset your password.

data.name: LoginSuccess
data.value: Login successful

data.name: LoginError
data.value: An error occurred during login

data.name: PasswordCorrupted
data.value: Account password is corrupted. Please contact support or register a new account.

data.name: AccountLockedOut
data.value: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later.

data.value: Invalid client request

data.value: Invalid access token or refresh token

data.value: Token successfully refreshed

data.name: InvalidProvider
data.value: Invalid provider

data.name: EmailRequired
data.value: Email is required

data.name: ExternalLoginError
data.value: External login failed

data.name: VerificationCodeSent
data.value: A new verification code has been sent to your email address. Please check your email.

data.name: UserCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: User created successfully. Please enter the 4-digit code sent to your email address.

data.name: VendorCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: Vendor account created successfully. Please enter the 4-digit code sent to your email address.

data.name: CourierCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: Courier account created successfully. Please enter the 4-digit code sent to your email address.

data.name: EmailVerifiedSuccessfully
data.value: Email address successfully verified.

data.name: CodeResentSuccessfully
data.value: Verification code resent successfully.

data.name: CodeResentMessage
data.value: If this email address is registered, a verification code has been sent.

data.name: PasswordResetSent
data.value: If the email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

data.name: PasswordTooShort
data.value: Password must be at least {0} characters long.

data.name: PasswordRequiresDigit
data.value: Password must contain at least one digit (0-9).

data.name: PasswordRequiresLowercase
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z).

data.name: PasswordRequiresUppercase
data.value: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z).

data.name: PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric
data.value: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&* etc.).

data.name: PasswordSameAsCurrent
data.value: New password must be different from current password.

data.name: EmailVerificationSubject
data.value: Talabi - Email Verification Code

data.name: ResetPasswordSubject
data.value: Talabi - Reset Password

data.name: AccountDeletedSuccessfully
data.value: Your account has been successfully deleted. We hope to see you again.
